content.question: Find all values of x on the open interval -6 < x < 3 for which the graph of g has a point of inflection. Explain your reasoning.

frqParts.text: Find all values of x on the open interval -6 < x < 3 for which the graph of g has a point of inflection. Explain your reasoning.
